name: Nebojsa Urosevic
description:
Co-founder & SVP of R&D of Tenderly. Before Tenderly, Nebojsa was a blockchain engineer at Decenter and a software engineer at GoDaddy. He has experience building, scaling, and maintaining large-scale distributed cloud systems. 

In Tenderly Nebojsa leads a diverse and experienced team of engineers and is one of the engineering leads. He has in-depth knowledge of the blockchain and EVM.
